description: go.talks: convert into hybrid stand-alone/appengine app, pretty up dir list

messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/go.talks

http://codereview.appspot.com/6492122/diff/1/present/socket.go
File present/socket.go (right):

http://codereview.appspot.com/6492122/diff/1/present/socket.go#newcode1
present/socket.go:1: // Copyright 2012 The Go Authors.  All rights reserved.
This diff is against main.go, as socket.go was split out of there.

Hello r@golang.org (cc: gobot@golang.org, golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

Please take another look.

*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=ac9c462d87a4&repo=talks ***

go.talks: convert into hybrid stand-alone/appengine app, pretty up dir list

R=r
CC=gobot, golang-dev
http://codereview.appspot.com/6492122

LGTM

http://codereview.appspot.com/6492122/diff/12002/present/doc.go
File present/doc.go (right):

http://codereview.appspot.com/6492122/diff/12002/present/doc.go#newcode22
present/doc.go:22: The file slide format
The rest of this comment describes the format of a slide file.

http://codereview.appspot.com/6492122/diff/12002/present/doc.go#newcode24
present/doc.go:24: Input files have the following format.  The first non-blank non-comment
s/Input/Slide/

http://codereview.appspot.com/6492122/diff/12002/present/doc.go
File present/doc.go (right):

http://codereview.appspot.com/6492122/diff/12002/present/doc.go#newcode22
present/doc.go:22: The file slide format
On 2012/09/21 19:03:38, r wrote:
> The rest of this comment describes the format of a slide file.

This shows up as a heading in godoc. Sure you want to change it?

http://codereview.appspot.com/6492122/diff/12002/present/doc.go#newcode24
present/doc.go:24: Input files have the following format.  The first non-blank non-comment
On 2012/09/21 19:03:38, r wrote:
> s/Input/Slide/

Done.
